recipe.title: Potato Salad with Garbanzo Beans
ingredients: 2 pounds large red-skinned potatoes, peeled, cut into 1/2- to 3/4-inch pieces
instructions: Whisk first 5 ingredients to blend in small bowl. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper. Steam potatoes until tender, about 15 minutes. Transfer potatoes to large bowl; add onion. Add 1/4 cup dressing and toss gently to coat. Let stand 10 minutes. Mix in garbanzo beans, celery and remaining dressing. Season salad to taste with salt and pepper.
Whisk first 5 ingredients to blend in small bowl. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper.

Steam potatoes until tender, about 15 minutes. Transfer potatoes to large bowl; add onion. Add 1/4 cup dressing and toss gently to coat. Let stand 10 minutes. Mix in garbanzo beans, celery and remaining dressing. Season salad to taste with salt and pepper.
